html:
12.3.21  7:07 pm   you've only been putting out music videos lately, are you gonna do anymore of your shorter skit videos again? 

      yes

12.3.21  5:47 pm   whats your alternative for font if arial left

      arial is alternative, if helvetica left

12.3.21  4:59 pm   I'm kind of scared to go and see the doctor what should I do?

      you're gonna have to be the doctor

12.3.21  4:41 pm   can you make more fiction videos?

      yes

12.3.21  3:43 pm   how can i feasibly use audacity to write/produce/whatever music?

      sure

12.3.21  2:53 pm   sometimes i listen to the recording im working on and it sounds pretty good. then later i listen to the same thing and it sounds bad. what is happening

      the universe is alive

12.3.21  1:21 pm   what do i do i just realized im extraordinarily unremarkable

      try to stay calm

12.3.21  12:55 pm   are you interested in learning about fractals?

      i already know about fractals

12.3.21  12:20 pm   any chords?

      yes

12.3.21  7:43 am   Bill, I'm having a problem with melodies. I'm kind of stuck in this state of mind where I'm thinking I can't "just write a melody" but instead, I have to do it in a certain way. I see the way Elton John and Billy Joel and Freddie Mercury seem to just sit down and try something a few times and it's good,

     have you seen them do it? i would be curious to see that

     but they are all obviously very knowledgeable in music. I know it's not true, but I'm having trouble breaking away from this idea that I need to know more before I even try to write a good melody. Anyways, do you have any advice on how to stop trying to mould my writing procedure on somebody else's? Thanks so much bill

      coming up with melodies is mysterious. i think anyone who does it would agree.... including probably the people you mentioned. there's nothing to know about it, besides just knowing how unknowable it is, so at least that way you won't be scared of how unknown it can be

12.3.21  4:56 am   how to find the purpose of our existence?

      try existing for 10 different purposes each day

12.3.21  1:31 am   Why did you stop updating "reality" and "notebook"?

      to return to updating other pages like "videos" and "songs"

12.2.21  10:24 pm   why do you know 66 digits of pi

      school yard rivalries i suppose

12.2.21  10:20 pm   Hey can you make a song about trees

      that sounds like something i would do

12.2.21  9:43 pm   what's the deal with cows

      they are medium sized

12.2.21  8:40 pm   do you like smelling books

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.2.21  6:30 pm   im editing a video, how do i not fall asleep while editing?

      do it live

12.2.21  4:50 pm   how do I get inspiration

      you already have it but it's also everywhere so you're gonna get more

12.2.21  2:24 pm   is it okay if the music i like is dramatic as fuck but i don't like dramatic movies and the likes 

      yes, thank you for checking with me

12.2.21  1:11 pm   What is the golden rule

      a=b

12.2.21  1:05 pm   what happens if you multiply happiness and sadness

      welcome to the real world

12.2.21  12:57 pm   Have you written any songs that, if recorded, would sound nothing like a song made by Bill Wurtz?

      that all depends if it was recorded by me

12.2.21  12:21 pm   why do pickles taste so weird

      because they are actually weird

12.2.21  11:43 am   how many things have you done

      still working on my first

12.2.21  11:30 am   are you excited for christmas

      i'm excited for everything

12.2.21  11:21 am   do you think the concept of things being good will ever be replaced with something even better than the concept of things being good

      yes, it happens every time

12.2.21  11:13 am   I got my 'Year in Review' from Spotify and I played Might Quit 939 times. Did you intend this? 

      i intended for it to be as many times as possible

12.2.21  4:25 am   How can I become more receptive to other people's advice? 

      try all your own advice first. get that out of the way

12.1.21  11:44 pm   If the two possible realities are the universe existing and the universe not existing, why do you think it was chosen for the universe to exist?

     everything happens eventually. so both should each happen at some point

     Do you think maybe the universe exists for a reason?

      i would argue it's a different number of reasons. one of those high unquantifiable numbers

12.1.21  9:46 pm   have you made songs where the tempo varies wildly

      no, but i've made videos where the tempo varies wildly

12.1.21  12:48 pm   What is the best thing to do 

      everything

12.1.21  12:23 pm   what size is a perfect christmas tree to you?

      just small enough to fit into a king size bed

12.1.21  12:10 pm   how many digits of pi do you know off by heart?

      66

12.1.21  11:34 am   what's your favorite key

      escape

12.1.21  11:31 am   can you make more reality videos?

      sure

12.1.21  11:29 am   what is the strangest thing about this world?

      you

12.1.21  11:09 am   how do I become a person

      you have to convince 2 other people to love each other enough to have sex

12.1.21  9:26 am   do you like bread

      the flavor overwhelms me

12.1.21  8:28 am   do you know where the revelation is?

      yes, it's right here (there)

12.1.21  7:56 am   how to not get distracted by thoughts?.

      how about having some feelings

12.1.21  3:20 am   why don't you respect my opinion 

      i do, but i respect your opinion of whether or not i respect your opinion

12.1.21  1:55 am   Airport terminal or train platform? Which do you prefer?

      i like them both exactly equally





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

11.30.21  11:54 pm   I don't know what I want to do in life, can u give me an idea?

      how about doing everything. just kidding, that's impossible. but it's a logical place to start

      how many do you want

      the middle

      116

      maybe later

11.30.21  8:49 pm   I just made my train, at 8:45, and then At the Airport Terminal came around on ye olde playlist, and I heard that line "it's 8:45 and I'm on the next flight". Coincidence?

      yes

11.30.21  8:12 pm   have you considered making one of your songs gospel styled?

      i'd like to do them all that way, if possible

      i'll try
